sentence: 1. I tried to make a robot that ate watches... but it was too time-consuming.
- Sentence: Time is a fundamental concept in physics that helps us measure the duration of events.
- Sentence: The meeting was set for a specific time, but it lasted much longer than planned.
2. Why was the geologist hungry? he had a large apatite.
- Sentence: The scientist studied the apatite mineral to understand its properties.
- Sentence: After a long day of work, he had an apatite for a hearty meal.
3. What did the fish say when he swam into a wall? dam.
- Sentence: The dam was built to control the flow of the river.
- Sentence: When he hit the wall, he let out a loud dam of frustration.
